title: Textile, 16th century
medium:
Medium: silk
Technique: cut and voided supplementary warp pile (velvet) in plain weave foundation
dimensions: Warp x Weft: 19.7 x 19.7 cm (7 3/4 x 7 3/4 in.)
description: Fragment of woven velvet with a small-scale symmetrical design of a bird, flowers and scrolls in green and pink pile on a white foundation.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, 16th century.
16th century. Medium: silk
Technique: cut and voided supplementary warp pile (velvet) in plain weave foundation. Gift of John Pierpont Morgan. 1902-1-727.
